title: Love Unexpected
description: Here is what you can expect: ⠀- Forbidden Romance/Taboo⠀- Age Gap ⠀- Stepfather/Stepdaughter ⠀- Enemies to lovers⠀- Interracial CoupleI’d only wanted one kiss. One kiss, under the dark of night, in a city where no one knew us. One kiss fueled by my hormones and alcohol and the blinding grief over losing my mother. One kiss from the man I told myself was untouchable. But, it didn’t stop at one kiss. And now we are running full speed down a road with no intention of stopping. His touch disarms me. His kiss revives me. But, our love, could destroy me. *This is a taboo novel and is intended for mature audiences only.
author: Q.B. Tyler
